<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 10"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bullet Dancer Reload](/Feats.aspx?ID=3238) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 132 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bullet Dancer](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=117)

**Prerequisites**
[Bullet Dancer Burn](/Feats.aspx?ID=3236)

**Requirements**
You're in Bullet Dancer Stance.

</column>

---

You've learned to reload your simple firearms with uncanny grace, the ammunition simply falling into place as though part of a well-practiced kata. You Strike with a simple firearm, and then Interact to reload that same firearm. You don't need a free hand to reload your simple firearm in this way.
name: Bullet Dancer Reload
